title: How to Make Traditional Andhra Coconut Chutney

steps.headline: Add coconut pieces in a mixer grinder jar.
Add dry roasted whole and dried red chilies.
Grind them together in the mixer grinder.
Place the chutney in a bowl and sprinkle the asafoetida powder.
Add Andhra seasoning with the curry leaves.
Mix them well with the spoon.
Serve with the boiled rice or apply it on a bread toast or roti.

text: Add coconut pieces in a mixer grinder jar.  Add dry roasted whole and dried red chilies.  Add salt.  Add turmeric powder.  Add water.  Add tamarind pulp.  Grind them together in the mixer grinder.  Place the chutney in a bowl and sprinkle the asafoetida powder.  Add Andhra seasoning with the curry leaves.  Mix them well with the spoon.  Serve with the boiled rice or apply it on a bread toast or roti.
